summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingBYOMA Balancing Face Mist is a lightweight, pH balanced, refreshing face mist that is the ultimate quick fix to instantly balance and soothe skin, supporting your microbiome for a healthier complexion.
details: DetailsBenefitsBalancing, soothing, refreshing face mistTri-Ceramide Complex to support skin barrier healthProbiotic ferment & allantoin to soothe and replenish skin's microbiomeDermatologist tested & approved skincareAlcohol & fragrance-freeRecyclable bottlesClinically proven to immediately increase moisturization after one useClinically proven to protect and maintain skin barrier with regular useFeaturesThis multi-tasking, on-the-go skincare treatment mimics your natural barrier function, with an ultra-fine mist that can be used anytime to tone and refresh skin without sticky residue. Spritz your way to balanced, healthier, hydrated skin for all skin types.Dermatologist tested and approved, oil-free, non-comedogenic, alcohol and fragrance-free, vegan and cruelty free skincare.Key IngredientsBarrier boosting Tri-Ceramide Complex (ceramides, cholesterol, fatty acids)Powerful duo of allantoin (to moisturize and soothe skin) and probiotic ferment helps replenish and fortify the skin's microbiome, shielding skin from environmental stressors and calming signs of redness and inflammation.Item 2620414How To UseShake well before each use and mist onto clean, dry skin. Follow with your favorite Byoma serums + moisturizer. Use as part of your daily regime as a toner or anytime your skin needs a refresh throughout the day.Precautions: Eye irritation.IngredientsAqua (Carrier), Butylene Glycol (Skin-Conditioner), Glycerin (Humectant), Propanediol (Solvent), Sorbitol (Skin-Conditioner), Ceramide NP (Skin-Conditioner), Cholesterol (Skin-Conditioner), Phytosphingosine (Skin-Conditioner), Lactobacillus Ferment (Skin-Conditioner), Bifida Ferment Filtrate (Skin-Conditioner), Stearic Acid (Skin-Conditioner), Caprylyl Glycol (Skin-Conditioner), Oleic Acid (Skin-Conditioner), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride (Skin-Conditioner), Hydrogenated Lecithin (Emulsifier), Allantoin (Skin-Conditioner), Panthenol (Skin-Conditioner), Lactic Acid (pH Adjusters), Betaine (Humectant), Hydroxyethylcellulose (Viscosity Controlling), Hydroxyacetophenone (Antioxidant), 1,2-Hexanediol (Solvents), Caprylhydroxamic Acid (Chelating Agents).
how_to_use: Shake well before each use and mist onto clean, dry skin. Follow with your favorite Byoma serums + moisturizer. Use as part of your daily regime as a toner or anytime your skin needs a refresh throughout the day.Precautions: Eye irritation.

reviews.headline: don't walk. RUN to go get this !
reviews.comments: I wish I would've taken before and after pictures. I had no idea that my face was going to change this drastically over a few days. all redness, dark spots, and every blemish on my face is gone. i have been using this for THREE DAYS ( morning and night ). I have even tried hydrochloric acid, and didn't have these results. Also learning that this can be used with azelic acid as well as with retinol at night is great to know too! i will definitely be re-purchasing!

reviews.headline: Second time buying
reviews.comments: I keep it in rotation ! Does exactly what it needs to do! Soothing

reviews.headline: I can see the hype but it's a no from me
reviews.comments: I do think this helped with the redness/texture I get around my nose BUT it is making me feel dry and chapped and doesn't wear well under makeup. I do have super sensitive skin though so maybe it's just me :/

reviews.headline: I don't think it dose anything
reviews.comments: This didn't do anything but it feels nice i would save your money though and just spray water on your face

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: It helped my skin within a few days! helps with hydrating

reviews.headline: Immediate breakouts
reviews.comments: Broke me out so bad within 2 days. I'm not super sensitive so , unfortunately it was a pass.

reviews.headline: very nice
reviews.comments: This toning mist is really beautiful and refreshing. I love the bottle design and it feels really nice on my skin. It's super easy to use and you can spray it on as much as you want.

reviews.headline: great !

reviews.headline: BYOMA Mist
reviews.comments: I love this product!! makes my skin feel refreshed and super clean! will be purchasing again!

reviews.headline: Painful Reaction on Neck After One Use
reviews.comments:
I really wanted to love this product, but unfortunately, it did not agree with my skin. I used it for the first time this morning, and just a few hours later I developed red, painful bumps all over my neck — exactly where I had sprayed it. The reaction came on quickly and felt more like burning/pain than itching.

My skin is usually pretty tolerant and I've used other products with similar ingredients without issue, so I was surprised. After checking the label, I suspect it may have been the combination of lactic acid, ferments, and preservatives that triggered the irritation. The fact that it's a spray probably didn't help, since it spread over a sensitive area of my skin. I would not recommend.

reviews.headline: My new favorite
reviews.comments: This will be my second time repurchasing this toner and I absolutely love it so much. I have very very dry skin and eczema on my face. This is the first product that keeps me hydrated during the day and does not burn my sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Loved it
reviews.comments: So hydrating absolutely recommend

reviews.headline: Helped clear up my cystic acne
reviews.comments: I tried this bc of a Nina Poole recommendation. I was skeptical, but this has really helped get my hormonal acne under control!. The spray mist is so fine it feels like a spa treatment. It really helps to balance your skins PH

reviews.headline: Perfect
reviews.comments:
*READ BEFORE PURCHASING*

Oh, where do I even start with the Byoma facial mist? It's like a little bottle of joy that's become a staple in my daily routine. The quality of the bottle is top-notch, it feels sturdy and well-made, like it's going to last a long time. 

The aesthetic of the bottle is just as impressive. It's sleek, modern, and has a certain elegance to it that makes it a beautiful addition to my vanity. It's not just a facial mist, it's a piece of decor!

But let's talk about the spray, because that's where the magic really happens. It's got a wide range, covering my face evenly with just a couple of spritzes. It's like a gentle, refreshing cloud that wakes up my skin and my senses. It has lasted me a long time. Also, it smells amazing. 

And the best part? It's such great value for money. It's not often you find a product that's high quality, looks good, and is priced just right. The Byoma facial mist is something I'm really glad I found. 

With all that being said...
GO BUY IT!

P.S. I said read first before purchasing at the beginning so you would realize how good your decision was :)

reviews.headline: So moisturizing!!
reviews.comments: I love this face mist because it distributes evenly across the face, and the mist is so fine and refreshing! Unlike other facial mists that just feel like water, this one actually moisturizes my face and leaves my skin feeling plump and healthy!! Absolute love it!!

reviews.headline: Amazing face mist that feels like it makes a difference
reviews.comments: I love this stuff! I use it every morning and night, and also days I am wearinf my makeup 12+ hours to provide some hydration my skin needs. It works amazing on bare skin or over makeup.

reviews.headline: Not Great for Me
reviews.comments: I bought this stuff and was super excited to have something to just spray on before I slap on my moisturizer and sunscreen and go. Unfortunately, I personally experienced breakouts from this product. I wouldn't fault it since I know I have sensitive skin, but there are plenty of products I've used on my skin that I haven't broken out from ... overall, I want to love it, and I almost wanna keep using it regardless of the breakouts, because it's so satisfying and fun to spray on, but I don't think I'd be doing myself any favors. But again, that might just be my skin, so I'd still rate the product well, as it feels nice, applies well, and did feel good on my skin before the breakouts. But then the breakouts were those painful deep under the skin ones, even on my neck too, bc I sprayed a bit there too. Too bad :(

reviews.headline: Pretty good and decent face mist
reviews.comments: Good for my sensitive skin i have a bunch of BYOMA porducts and love then all truly really good brand you should definitely try some of their products!

reviews.headline: best mist i've tried
reviews.comments: this face mist is sooo good. my skin loves it. its very refreshing too. it makes my skin glowy, dewy, and soft.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: It helped so much and it last forever

faceoff_positive.comments: I really love this balancing face mask! It has probiotics and Allentoin in it! Really great for your skin! After I wash my face with water and Pat my skin dry I spray my face with this awesome tone mist. My skin feels so restored renewed and rebalanced. Another thing that really caught my attention is that it has no fragrance so that means no extra ingredients that cause irritation due to sensitive skin. Just make sure you follow the directions properly cleanse your face shake Miss bottle well, mist want to clean dry skin and make sure you use it as a daily regimen. I've been using this everyday and my skin has been more clear and feels more soft and natural.
faceoff_positive.headline: Face mist

faceoff_negative.comments:
I was excited to try this as I've always used a rose water based toner. I was disappointed upon first use. I expected this to perform like a typical toner—leaving my skin with a refreshed feeling. This was not my experience. 

If you enjoy a fragrance free facial mist/toner, this could be for you. I applied as directed, shaking well, misting it, after cleansing my skin in the morning. I found it kind of sprayed in a relatively uniform single stream, therefore I wasn't able to get anything close to an aerosol mist. The product applicator could be better to create a mist. 

I eventually found that I prefer to apply this via spraying into my hands and dabbing it onto my face. Unfortunately, this also left my skin feeling super tacky, every time. My skin never had a cooling, refreshed sensation that I have had with a typical rose water toner. I love the idea of this, but the product didn't perform. I was at least looking for the refreshing sensation and it didn't happen! The tackiness also took at least ten minutes to go away. I didn't experience any breakouts or irritation on the bright side. This did not live up to my expectations unfortunately.
faceoff_negative.headline: No refreshing sensation
